LanguageData.ATR_ReloadRequiredDesc: Some changes will only take effect on reloading saves (Not the entire game).
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsFixedGenderSelector: All androids are male (false) or female (true)
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsGenderRatio: Chance for android to pick male gender vs female gender
LanguageData.ATR_PlayerOnlyNote: If disabled, androids will only exist when built by the player
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsAppearNaturally: Androids can appear as parts of factions or events
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidFactionSettings: What role do android factions play? Only affects NEW games
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidRaidersExist: Androids have formed their own pirate collective
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidUnionistsExist: Androids dedicated to collective survival have unified
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidOnlyNotice: Note: Only units marked as androids are affected by this. Drones have no such needs.
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedJoy: Androids need to fulfill joy needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedBeauty: Androids need to fulfill beauty needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedComfort: Androids need to fulfill comfort needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedOutdoors: Androids need to fulfill outdoors/indoors needs
LanguageData.ATR_useBatteryByDefault: New mechanical units default to using battery.
LanguageData.ATR_wattsConsumedPerBodySize: Power use per 1 body size when charging [default: 500]
LanguageData.ATR_batteryPercentagePerRareTick: Percentage of battery charged per Rare Tick (~4 seconds) [default: 7%]
LanguageData.ATR_mechanicalsHaveDifferentBioprocessin: Mechanical units handle nutrition differently than organics.
LanguageData.ATR_skillPointConversionRate: Amount of base XP generated per skill point [default: 10]
LanguageData.ATR_passionSoftCap: Passion soft-cap before cost increases per passion [default: 8]
LanguageData.ATR_basePointsNeededForPassion: Base skill points needed per passion [default: 1000]
